Name: Access Resource
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Allow a visitor or a guest to access to select private resources via a request, an ip check, an authentication, or a token.

Name: Adminer database manager
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Access to Omeka database through Adminer, a one-file full-featured database management tool.

Name: Admin Plus
Author: GhentCDH
Description: Item/Item-set admin browse improvements

Name: Advanced Resource Template
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add new features to the resource templates to simplify and to improve the edition of resources: closed template, auto-completion, property groups, select language, lock, auto-filling, etc.

Name: Advanced Search adapter for Solr
Author: Daniel Berthereau (based on Solarium and module Solr v0.4)
Description: Search Omeka resources instantly and deeply on any server with Apache Solr / Lucene
Tags: Solr, Lucene, search, facet, filter, indexation, auto-suggestion

Name: Advanced Search
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Improve search with new fields, aggregated properties, auto-suggest, filters, facets, specific pages, etc.
Tags: search, advanced search, auto-suggest, filter, facet, admin, curation

Name: Advanced Search Plus (archived, replaced by Advanced Search)
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add some fields to the advanced search form (before/after creation date, has media, media type, etc.).

Name: Agile Tools
Author: Agile Humanities Agency
Description: Adds blocks and tools for Omeka theming, including page regions, card layouts, and an implmentation of Slick Carousel.

Name: Alt Text
Author: John Flatness
Description: Customize alt text for media

Name: Amazon S3 Storage
Author: Jared Howland
Description: Omeka S Storage module for Amazon S3 based on the official AWS SDK.

Name: Amazon S3
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Files store that integrates with Amazon S3.

Name: Analytics Snippet
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add a snippet, generally a javascript tracker, in public or admin pages, and allows to track json and xml requests.

Name: Analytics Snippet Matomo (Piwik)
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Submodule for Analytics Snippet to track json (in particular Omeka S API) and xml (like with OAI-PMH Repository) calls with Matomo (Piwik).

Name: Annotate
Author: Daniel Berthereau for EHESS
Description: Implement the W3C Web Annotation Ontology to let users annotate, tag, comment, rate, highlight, draw, etc. any resource in a normalized way.
Tags: annotation, tag, comment, rating, w3c recommendation, linked data

Name: Annotate images and maps (Cartography)
Author: Daniel Berthereau for EHESS
Description: Allows to annotate images and to locate data on standard wms maps with the w3c web annotation data model and vocabulary.

Name: Any Cloud
Author: Jared Howland & Jon Fackrell
Description: Omeka S module for storing items in the cloud storage of your choice.
Tags: amazon s3 aws, wasabi, azure, digital ocean, dropbox, google, scaleway, storage, file system

Name: Api Info
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Gives access to some infos about Omeka sites and resources, that are not available in the default api, mainly for external apps.

Name: Archive Folder
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Automatically import a local or remote folder into Omeka as collections, items, files, and metadata.

Name: Archive Repertory
Author: Daniel Berthereau (based on BibLibre port)
Description: Keeps original names of imported files and put them in a hierarchical structure (collection / item / files) in order to get readable urls for files and to avoid an overloading of the file server.

Name: Ark
Author: Daniel Berthereau, based on Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Create short, unique, meaningless, universal and persistent identifiers (ark and/or noid) and use them as urls for records.

Name: Ark URL
Author: BibLibre
Description: Companion module for Ark that replaces resources URLs by their ARK URLs

Name: Base
Author: Pols12
Description: Base of a module to execute a script.

Description: Allow user to add basket
